text:
Mauro Mellini (10 February 1927 – 5 July 2020) was an Italian politician and lawyer. Mellini was born in Civitavecchia, Italy. He was first elected to the Chamber of Deputies in 1976 on the Radical Party ticket. Mellini remained in office until 1992.
Mellini died at a Rome hospital on 5 July 2020, aged 93.
